allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller's account to the specified recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from another address's account.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE.description: Returns the default admin role identifier.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of the specified address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused.

getRoleAdmin.description: Returns the admin role for a given role.

getRoleMember.description: Returns the member of a role at a given index.

getRoleMemberCount.description: Returns the number of members in a role.

grantRole.description: Grants a role to an account.

hasRole.description: Checks if an account has a specific role.

renounceRole.description: Renounces a role from the caller.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a role from an account.
